ComicInfo.Title: A World Of Her Own, Part Three of Three
ComicInfo.Summary: As the new Kato struggles to free herself from a high-tech virtual reality designed to drive her mad, the clock is ticking. Green Hornet and the original Kato hit the streets (Kato behind the wheel of an old friend), trying to find Mulan before her brain is permanently damaged. Will Mulan free herself, or will the Black Hornet's sister exact her horrific revenge? All-out action, featuring two generations of heroes.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-12 19:17:54. [CVDB293583] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 20:11:13. [Issue ID 880009]
ComicInfo.Characters: Kato,Mulan Kato,Clutch Kato,Britt Reid Jr.,Katsuko Juuma,The Green Hornet,Oni Juuma
